channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine facing choice between losing major partner or its dignity, says Zelenskyy as he considers US plan – Europe live
item.description: Ukrainian president warns that next week could be ‘very difficult’ for his country German Bild tabloid is also reporting that Merz is expected to hold...

item.title: Donald Trump and Zohran Mamdani to have first face-to-face meeting at the White House
item.description: US president and New York City mayor-elect, two ideologically opposed leaders, will meet after months of back and forth US politics live – latest upda...

item.title: Trump’s threats amount to calls for ‘execution of elected officials’, says Chuck Schumer – US politics live
item.description: Democrat Senate minority leader says president’s remarks are ‘outright threat’ as other leading Democrats warn ‘political violence has no place in Ame...

item.title: Reeves ‘not even sure what the popular path is’ on the budget – UK politics live
item.description: Chancellor says ‘We can’t just carry on like this and muddle through. We have to make some decisions to get on a different path’ Prime minister Keir S...

item.title: Thousands of NHS GPs are cutting their hours despite plan to increase access to doctors
item.description: Just one in 13 early career GPs work full-time, NHS figures show, with job stress and childcare significant factors Much of the health secretary’s pla...

item.title: South Africa calls gender violence a national disaster after protests
item.description: Fifteen women are killed every day in a country with one of the highest rates of gender violence in the world.

item.title: UK expected to approve plans for Chinese mega embassy
item.description: A final decision has not yet been formally taken but the controversial project is expected to be given the go-ahead.

item.title: UN climate summit drops mention of fossil fuels from draft deal
item.description: A row over fossil fuels has broken out at COP30 but this is also likely to be a negotiating tactic.

item.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
item.description: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

item.title: Uefa orders Scotland fans to remove celebration videos from X
item.description: European football's governing body claimed clips of fans cheering Scotland's World Cup qualification in front of TV screens breached copyright.
